column4:
Being able to quickly dial 9-8-8 in a mental health crisis will give Americans a much-needed resource to help reverse the tragic trend of suicide. I am grateful to @POTUS  for prioritizing mental health & signing this bill into law in a timely manner. 

https://t.co/ZmJtWVPMef

#worldmentalhealthday reminds us all that mental health is just as important as physical health. Treat others with love & kindness, not just today—but everyday. And if you are feeling depressed, lonely, or experiencing thoughts of suicide, remember that you are not alone.

Suicide is one of the leading causes of death among youth in Utah. Some of my proudest work in Congress has been trying to reverse this. If you need to take care of your dependent children for an extended period because of coronavirus, this bill gives you up to 10 weeks of pay.
 
If you are an employer, these costs will be 100% refunded to you by the government through this bill.
If you need to care for a family member, or you care for your dependent children, as a result of the coronavirus, this bill will grant temporary sick leave for 2 weeks.

Millions of Americans work at a small business and don’t have access to paid leave, forcing workers to choose between their paycheck, their health, and the health of the people around them.

If you get sick, this bill will give you two weeks of paid leave.
Earlier this week, Congress passed the Families First Coronavirus Response Act which expands access to emergency paid sick leave to as many as 87 million Americans.

Congress has been hard at work to ensure that the federal government can fully respond to the needs of Americans affected by the coronavirus outbreak. Keep reading to understand what we’ve done so far to protect Americans.

September is #NationalSuicidePreventionMonth. Every 12 minutes 1 person dies by suicide in the U.S. This month I'll be working to raise awareness & push my new legislation designating 9-8-8 as the dialing code for the National Suicide Prevention & Mental Health Crisis Hotline.

Just introduced the #NationalSuicideHotlineDesignationAct with leading co-sponsors @teammoulton, @RepEBJ, & #RepGianforte. This bi-partisan legislation designates 9-8-8 as the universal telephone number for the National Suicide Prevention & Mental Health Crisis hotline system.

After 675 days the Russia investigation is finally over. Robert Mueller found exactly what the House Intel committee did more than a year ago: no evidence of collusion or conspiracy between the Trump campaign and Russia.

The long-awaited Mueller Report has been completed. Early reporting appears to confirm what we've been saying for over a year: no collusion or conspiracy between Russia & the Trump campaign. The full report should be released to Congress & the American people as soon as possible.
